entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets. High zero.
